products.title: Disney Collection Frozen 2 Forces Of Nature Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their stunning disney frozen 2 forces of nature electric roller blind is bursting with colour and character. Printed on a blackout fabric to block the light out the ocean blue with strokes of purple and gold will transform a playroom or bedroom into a part of the frozen film. This electric roller blind features waves flowing high with elsa and anna wrapped up in the storm, with splashes of purple and blue for a iconic finish.
